tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: But the energy and enthusiasm towards the patient was very poor they haven't given the proper information by themselves I have to ask, if a patient don't have which particular cap should be used the doctor should himself suggest and guide the patient The energy of the receptionist was very very very low

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very good doctor with great insights and experience. You can feel at home! 
He explains the procedure clearly and keep us informed. Very very nominal charges and good service.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I Visited the clinic on 13th November 2021 with the terrific teeth ache.
everything is good, but the Dr checked my mouth and did the X-Ray.
they found an infection in my teeth. 
******* ********* *** *********** ** ********* Dr asked me to do the root canal procedure.
I said I will do that later and asked for the X-Ray report they told they will share the report in the mail. Till now (15/11/2021) not received the mail I have asked 2 times verbally and 1 once in WhatsApp chat.

Also the consultation charge and other process charge are bit high compared  to other clinics.** ******* *** ******* ****** *** **** *** *** **** ********* *** ******** **** *********** *** ********** * ** ********** **** *** ******* ***** *** **** ***** ********
reply_text:
Hi sir, thank you for taking time to review..
First I want to tell you that there is infection in your tooth which requires RCT and with only antibiotics it won't reduce.. if someone has told with medicine infection will go in dental infection it's upto them.
Regarding the charges it is upto every doctor to fix their charges and will be informed before.. if someone wants not to pay that fee they are not forced to get the treatment. To your knowledge we have only one time registration charges of Rs 300 valid for 1year.. anywhere valid for a week or so..
Last regarding the X ray that day we have some problem with our laptop, which we have given for service.. which is expected to come tomorrow...after that we can send you... We will give all patients data to them to keep for future reference.. we provide OP card for what treatment done and all also where many places will be giving only one prescription..

Thank you

tags: Value for money,
review: Very disappointed , they charge 1000 for **** cap fixing (old cap) without clean.surface they fix the cap
reply_text: Hi sir, thank you for your feedback... In that 1000 you know that 300 is for consultation and registration fee which will be charged for first time visit and 700 is for treatment charges... Because we follow strick covid protocol we need to maintain the clinic with all saftety protocols for sanitization after each patient, ppe kits, and fumigation of clinic every day is costing us more.. and treatment charges and consultation charges will be told before which are accepted..

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review: Charged 300 Rs for 2-3 mins of consultation (which otherwise is free) and was forcing to take a service worth 1400 (which outside is 500rs) without actual need of it.
reply_text:
Hi sir, thank you for expecting all for free.. including consultation and treatment....
The treatment what you are asking is for cleaning the teeth( scaling) and you mentioned it is actually not needed.. can you recollect for what you have come and asked for in the clinic?? ...
Last regarding the charges consultation is there which will be informed before itself and also 500Rs for scaling is been taken outside which if you have speaking without knowledge...
And last no one will force to take service.. you have come for scaling and you told i have a flight... And you asked for appointment next week..
Sorry i think you would have forget all these sir..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor was very impatient 
*** *********** *** *** **** ******** 
He used a gel for anaesthesia that did not seem to work and he didn’t really care much about it
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback,
Actually the word impatient you have used for the time we have taken nearly 30min for convincing the kid for the actually procedure takes 2min..
This is not the first time you have brought the kid... I have seen multiple times and already done the extraction before also... As the kid is more scared she don't want the procedure done she is telling pain... Based on that if you are guiding people.. it is up to you... Please don't neglect the kids oral hygiene because she says she don't want to get the treatment as I have showed how permanent teeth are effected..
